title: Bsc psych inquiry needed before i fill up the application form
content: fees, crowd, mode of entrance test and interview etc details needed . i would highly appreciate if anyone could help me out

comments.body: The fees was 1.8L plus 10,000 non refundable. There was only an online interview process, no written pessat. For the interview, js have a good understanding of the course and good answers. The crowd is mid but once you find the people it'll be good. Dw we'll be good seniors❗❗ See you in bootstrap

hey, do you mind dming? I have my interview man couple of hours and im nervous as hell
Few pointers on what exactly i should be prepared for might help. Cheers :)
